metadata.description:
Being unapologetically expressive within my femininity & sensuality is a state that was alien to me. I always felt like a shell of myself, shrinking to appease the appetites & judgments of others. Finding my voice through music has encouraged me to release censorship of self.

Swift is one of the first songs I wrote after years of suppressing expression. It was also the first music video that I directed, choreographed, & produced with my company, Forbidden Fruit, on July 31, 2021.

Swift is an embodiment of sexualityâ€™s pure nature, linking us from our inner children to our primal instincts & base desires. Swift is a reclamation of Play. Passion. & Pleasure... & it is my hope that this piece inspires others to find liberation deep within.

Director: Crux 
Creative Director: Affia 
Producer: Nabid 
Engineer: Fuzzmack 
Videographer: $tonez the Organic 
Editors: Fazevzn + Crux 
VFX: Sam Sherfey + Crux 
Choreographer: Crux 
Dancers: Aaminah, Sylvie, Ericka 
Director of Photography: JoLeaha Larke 
Stylist: Crux 
Production: Forbidden Fruit
metadata.name: Swift #1
metadata.title: Swift
